column5: WOW, the rain is just pounding down right now, infact so hard it set off the motion lights outside.  Guess it beats snow though
yes it was sure raining hard on sturgeon lake this morn lew it woke me up a few times during the night..!! more to come as well,gonna get heaveir through the day too....
at least you should have no problems finding some deer for your ark. All I can claim is some giant worms on the driveway this morning
Deer are definetely better than giant worms Roger
It came down hard last night here in Jokeville. I can't get into the backyard to clean out and dig up the veggie garden, waaaay too mucky.

Been raining here all week long.   Couple half-decent days over the week-end and more rain for a good part of next week.  I hope this is not a sign of what's to come this winter.  Maybe it will get it out of its system now.
Lew, didn't you help Noah launch the first one? Lol
Nope, by the time he was ready Dave, I was too old & feeble to help
In Milton lastnight my patio umbrella got nailed by lightning around 11:05pm, the pond took a beating too, poor duckies!! we got hammered good lastnight!! The Rivers needed this rain cant wait!!!!!

yes i hear ya about needed rain,us up in the kawarthas needed it too,they are already doing the big fall drawdown,and things needed a good soaking for sure...sorry bout your stuff getting hit by lightning,our house got hit in the spring blew out the well pump,uv system,and a gfi breaker...and the puter was toast too...
